Looks like JadEclipse is calling an internal method in JCORE which no longer eixsts. Likely an illeagal interal access that changed. I would file a bug with JadEclipse.

Moving to JCore for disposal.
Darin is correct. SourceMapper#mapSource(IType, char[]) is internal and was removed on February 6th.

I reported the bug to JadEclipse.
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1460727&group_id=40205&atid=427342
